instruction: Produce poetry about a summer day.
output:
The sun glows bright, on this summery night,
Filled with delights and pure delight.
The flowers bloom with blooming colors,
Breeze whisking wafts of fragrances to my nose.

The birds soar above singing sweet melodies,
There’s no greater joy than to roam in nature’s abode.
Beneath the canopy of stars and blue sky,
I bask in summer’s warmth and relief. 

The heat of summer warms my soul,
It is the season of life, so alive and grand.
As I stand beside the babbling brook,
I am humbled, celebrating nature’s beauty. 

The joy of summer days never grows old,
Never ceasing in its amazement. 
My heart finds its place in these sweet moments, 
Savoring every second, summer days be the best around.
